# differentiateWithoutColorDidChangeNotification

**Type Property**

A notification that UIKit posts when the system’s Differentiate Without Color setting changes.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated static let differentiateWithoutColorDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Differentiate without color

- **shouldDifferentiateWithoutColor**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Differentiate Without Color setting is in an enabled state.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the Differentiate Without Color setting is in an enabled state.
